ack.p: We acknowledge the National Research Council, Sri Lanka (TO 14-04) for funding and the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA SRL5/047) for technical cooperation. The authors also wish to acknowledge the Regional Epidemiology Unit in the District of Gampaha.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: We acknowledge the National Research Council, Sri Lanka (TO 14-04) for funding and the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA SRL5/047) for technical co-operation. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The number of monthly dengue incidence are available at web site of the Epidemiology Unit of Sri Lanka and the meteorological data are available at the Department of Meteorology, Colombo 07, Sri Lanka. Furthermore, raw data are available from the authors upon request.
